page.title: 20Credits and Acknowledgements
page.content: This Domesday Project text was written by, {Lisa Bland,David Brewis,Christian {Butterfield,Jane Cooper,Tommy Dame, {Sarah Dodman,Belinda Fisher,Linda {Grant,Joanne Grimley,Lee Hatfield, {Stephanie Hoather,Simon Hughes,Melissa {Knights,Wendy McDermid,Victoria {Mellin,Sean Partridge,Timothy Powell, {Dawn Rainer,Oliver Rising,Michael {Robertson,Jane Simmons,Sean Smith, {Stephen Smith,Emma Storer,Paul Stubbs, {Beverly Taylor,James Taylor,Paul {Wilmot, Lisa Woodiwiss,Helen Woodliff. { }Class 6 and Miss M.W.Cross,the Leas Junior School, would like to thank, {Mrs.N.Holland,Mr.P.Dales,Mrs.E.Calvert {Mrs.S.Reynard,Mr.M.Fowler,Mr.J.Porter, {Rev.A.Nunnerley,Rev.N.Fox,Mr.W.Wilson, {Mr.G.Fewell,Mr.J.Mayor, Mr.D.Cross, {Mrs.J.Darnell,Mrs.G.Farmery and {Mrs.S.Knights.}
